sqlMap.sql: FInterID, FBillNo, FBrNo, FTranType, FCancellation, FStatus, FDiscountType, Fdate, FSaleStyle, FFetchStyle, FCurrencyID, FCustID, FFetchAdd, FCheckDate, FMangerID, FDeptID, FEmpID, FBillerID, FSettleID, FExchangeRate, FMultiCheckDate1, FMultiCheckDate2, FMultiCheckDate3, FMultiCheckDate4, FMultiCheckDate5, FMultiCheckDate6, FPOOrdBillNo, FRelateBrID, FTransitAheadTime, FImport, FSelTranType, FBrID, FSettleDate, FExplanation, FAreaPS

FInterID, FEntryID, FBrNo, FMapNumber, FMapName, FItemID, FAuxPropID, FQty, FUnitID, Fauxqty, FSecCoefficient, FSecQty, Fauxprice, FAuxTaxPrice, Famount, FCess, FTaxRate, FUniDiscount, FTaxAmount, FAuxPriceDiscount, FTaxAmt, FAllAmount, FTranLeadTime, FInForecast, FDate, Fnote
sqlMap.insert: insert into SEOrder() select (select top 1 MAX(MaxOrderID) from YDH_Max_OrderID), #orderNum#, '0', 81, 0, 0, 0, (select CONVERT(char,#createTime#,23)), 101, '', 1, isnull((Select FItemID FROM T_Organization where FNumber=#customer.code#),'000'), '', Null, 0, 310, 67901, 16548, 0, 1, Null, Null, Null, Null, Null, Null, '', 0, '3', 0, 0, 0, (select CONVERT(char,#createTime#,23)), '', 20302

insert into SEOrderEntry() select (select FInterID from SEOrder where FBillNo = #orderNum#), isnull((select MAX(FEntryID)+1 from SEOrderEntry where FInterID = (select FInterID from SEOrder where FBillNo = #orderNum#)),1), '0', '', '', isnull((select FItemID from t_ICItemCore where FNumber = #productCode#),0), 0, #count#, isnull((select FUnitID from T_ICItemBase where FItemID = (select FItemID from t_ICItemCore where FNumber = #productCode#)),0), #count#, 0, 0, #price#, #price#, #money#*100/117, 17.00, 0, 0, 0, #price#, #money#*17/117, #money#, '', 0, (select CONVERT(char,getdate(),23)), #productRemark#
sqlMap.update:
DELETE FROM SEOrder WHERE FBillNo in
#list[].orderNum#

DELETE FROM t_sale_bill WHERE FORDERNUM in
#list[].orderNum#
